sentences.en: A little bonus will give the employees an incentive to work harder.
sentences.cn: 一点奖金可以刺激雇员更加努力地工作.

sentences.en: As an added incentive, there’s a bottle of champagne for the best team.
sentences.cn: 给最优秀的队发一瓶香槟作为额外的鼓励。

sentences.en: Cities will have a powerful incentive to discourage recycling.
sentences.cn: 城市将采取有力的措施阻止再循环.

sentences.en: Coffee production also stagnated, because farmers had little incentive to replace old trees.
sentences.cn: 由于农民得不到什么鼓励去更新老树,咖啡生产也停滞了.

sentences.en: Councils should charge realistic rents in order to give people an incentive to own their houses.
sentences.cn: 地方当局应采取合理的房租以鼓励人们买房.

sentences.en: Higher, more stable prices would provide an incentive for commercial collection.
sentences.cn: 高昂而稳定的价格,对大规模回收是一种鼓励.

sentences.en: Low levels of profitability mean there is a lack of incentive to undertake new investment.
sentences.cn: 利润率低意味着缺乏新投资的动力.

sentences.en: Money is still a major incentive in most occupations.
sentences.cn: 在许多职业中,钱仍是主要的鼓励因素.

sentences.en: Money is still a major incentive to most people.
sentences.cn: 对于大多数人来说,金钱仍是主要的刺激物.

sentences.en: Neither side would have an incentive to start a war. Ergo, peace would reign.
sentences.cn: 双方都不会有开战的动机，所以将会是和平时期。

sentences.en: Taxes must come down to give the British working men some incentive.
sentences.cn: 减低税收,以刺激英国工人.

sentences.en: That should be all the incentive you need.
sentences.cn: 这应该是你所需要的全部激励。

sentences.en: The incentive is financial; the requirements are essentially procedural.
sentences.cn: 这一动机是由于财政问题而引起的, 这样的要求是基本的程序.

sentences.en: There will be a major incentive among TV channels to keep standards up.
sentences.cn: 将会有重大举措鼓励各电视频道维持高标准。

sentences.en: There will be a strong incentive to enter into a process of negotiation.
sentences.cn: 将会出现迫切地想要进入谈判阶段的强烈动机。

sentences.en: There's an economic incentive to comply with the bans, says Ropiek.
sentences.cn: 罗匹克说, 在遵守禁令的问题上还须有经济上的刺激.

sentences.en: We have no objection if this prize is an incentive to reverse the warmongering and unilateral policies of the previous US administration and if this encourages a policy based on just peace.
sentences.cn: 如果这个奖项是为了激励美国改变前政府穷兵黩武的习惯和单边政策，为了激励一个仅建立于和平基础上的政策，那我们并不反对。

sentences.en: You get a big salary incentive and free board and lodging too.
sentences.cn: 你们能获得大笔激励性薪水，还可享受免费膳宿。

phrases.tran_cn: 经济激励，经济刺激；经济诱因
激励相容；剌激的协调性
奖金，奖励津贴；奖励工资，激励工资

trans.tran_en: something that encourages you to work harder, start a new activity etc
